none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on October 20, 2015 Description from Terminal Escape:
I'm pretty sure when you woke up this morning you thought to yourself, "Shit. It's Tuesday. I know I have to go to work, but what I really want to do is blast some riff-heavy early '00s fast core with ripping crossover leads, gratuitous sing along choruses and shameless speed picking." Well, friend, I said the same thing.  Fortunately there was a band from São Paulo who is happy to help us all out. WAR INSIDE
//2.bp.blogspot.com/-cOX53b602Cc/ViW3GbUyXbI/AAAAAAAANZg/-lQknJPh8HQ/s1600/war%2Binside%2Bcover.jpg //4.bp.blogspot.com/-3uEyt_8eMH0/ViW6Ty_jdqI/AAAAAAAANZs/FMZyCGjY_Wg/s1600/war%2Binside%2Bimg.jpg //2.bp.blogspot.com/--z3rYELpzis/ViW6ZMyCxDI/AAAAAAAANZ0/0KTwcOqz1kA/s1600/war%2Binside%2Bimg2.jpg

seo.title: War Inside - War Inside demo 2003 - Terminal Escape
